RULES_ITEM.RULE: Send mail with attach Weekly App Health Report

RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select report_file_id as "Report File ID", report_name as "Report Name", description as "Report Description", report_file_id as "Report File Id" from report_files

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: Attention! L'ID de l'Étiquette est réservé pour le Type de Règle. L'utiliser uniquement pour le Type de Règle de l'étiquette ou de la description
Executed when report is successfully run, before report delivery started
Executed when report is successfully run, before report delivery started
Executed when report is successfully run, before report delivery started
보고서가 성공적으로 달릴 때,시작되는 보고 납품의 앞에 실행되는
Exécuté lorsque le rapport est exécuté avec succès; Avant de commencer la livraison
Ejecuta cuando el informe se ejecuta con éxito, antes de iniciar la entrega del informe

T_BPD_ITEM.NAME: Send mail with attach Weekly App Health Report

T_REPORT_SQL.SQL_TEXT:
with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual )
select t_log.tm_log_id "TM Log ID", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/grid/SimpleGrid.do?ModuleName=TRACKOR_MAIL_LOG' "Link", t_status.name "Status", t_log.ts "Timestamp", t_xitor_type.xitor_type "Trackor Type", t_log.from_address "From Address", t_log.to_address "To Address", t_log.subject "Subject", t_log.error_message "Error Message" from tm_log t_log join dates on (1 = 1) join tm_log_status t_status on ( t_status.tm_log_status_id = t_log.status_id ) join tm_setup t_setup on ( t_setup.tm_setup_id = t_log.tm_setup_id ) join xitor_type t_xitor_type on ( t_xitor_type.xitor_type_id = t_setup.xitor_type_id ), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where t_log.ts between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and t_log.status_id in (1 /*Processing error*/, 3 /*Processing error (TF)*/, 4 /*Job error*/)

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual ) select rf.report_name || isp.name || i.integration_name || r.rule "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/admin/reports/Form.do?id=' || rf.report_file_id "Link", p.process_id "Process ID", ps.status "Status", p.un "Owner", to_char(p.submission_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(p.start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", p.error_message "Error Message" from process p join dates on (1 = 1) join process_status ps on (p.status_id = ps.process_status_id) left join integration_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join integration i on (i.integration_id = ir.integration_id) left join rule_run rr on (rr.process_id = p.process_id) left join rule r on (r.rule_id = rr.rule_id) left join report_run rfr on (rfr.process_id = p.process_id) left join report_files rf on (rf.report_file_id = rfr.report_file_id) left join imp_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join imp_spec isp on (ir.imp_spec_id = isp.imp_spec_id), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where p.submission_date between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and p.process_type_id in (1 /*Report*/) and p.status_id in (3 /*Executed with Errors*/, 14 /*Interrupted*/, 20 /*Canceled: Num Cells Limit Exceeded*/)

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual ) select rf.report_name || isp.name || i.integration_name || r.rule "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/admin/rules/Form.do?id=' || r.rule_id "Link", p.process_id "Process ID", ps.status "Status", p.un "Owner", to_char(p.submission_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(p.start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", p.error_message "Error Message", u1.un "Created By", u2.un "Modified By" from process p join dates on (1 = 1) join process_status ps on (p.status_id = ps.process_status_id) left join integration_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join integration i on (i.integration_id = ir.integration_id) left join rule_run rr on (rr.process_id = p.process_id) left join rule r on (r.rule_id = rr.rule_id) left join report_run rfr on (rfr.process_id = p.process_id) left join report_files rf on (rf.report_file_id = rfr.report_file_id) left join imp_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join imp_spec isp on (ir.imp_spec_id = isp.imp_spec_id) left join comp_object_log col on ( col.component_id = 4 /*Rule*/ and col.object_id = r.rule_id ) left join users u1 on (u1.user_id = col.created_by) left join users u2 on (u2.user_id = col.modified_by), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where p.submission_date between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and p.process_type_id in (6 /*Rule*/) and ( p.status_id in (3 /*Executed with Errors*/, 14 /*Interrupted*/, 20 /*Canceled: Num Cells Limit Exceeded*/) or (p.status_id in (0 /*Pending*/, 4 /*In Queue*/) and p.start_date < current_date) )

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual )
select t_nq.notif_queue_id "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/grid/SimpleGrid.do?ModuleName=ADMIN_NOTIF_QUEUE' "Link", t_nq.to_address "Recipient (Email)", t_nq.subj "Subject", case when t_nq.queue_status_id = 4 then 'Failed. No more attempts' end "Status", to_char(t_nq.created_ts, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(t_nq.processed_ts, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", t_nqa.err_code "Error Message" from notif_queue t_nq join notif_queue_attempt t_nqa on ( t_nqa.notif_queue_id = t_nq.notif_queue_id ) join (select t_nq.notif_queue_id "Process Object Name", max(t_nqa.notif_queue_attempt_id) "LAST_ATTEMPT_ID" from notif_queue t_nq join dates on (1 = 1) join notif_queue_attempt t_nqa on ( t_nqa.notif_queue_id = t_nq.notif_queue_id ) where t_nq.created_ts between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and t_nq.queue_status_id = 4 /*Failed. No more attempts*/ group by t_nq.notif_queue_id) t_filter_notif on (t_filter_notif.last_attempt_id = t_nqa.notif_queue_attempt_id), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual ) select rf.report_name || isp.name || i.integration_name || r.rule "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/admin/configimport/Form.do?id=' || isp.imp_spec_id "Link", p.process_id "Process ID", ps.status "Status", p.un "Owner", to_char(p.submission_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(p.start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", p.error_message "Error Message" from process p join dates on (1 = 1) join process_status ps on (p.status_id = ps.process_status_id) left join integration_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join integration i on (i.integration_id = ir.integration_id) left join rule_run rr on (rr.process_id = p.process_id) left join rule r on (r.rule_id = rr.rule_id) left join report_run rfr on (rfr.process_id = p.process_id) left join report_files rf on (rf.report_file_id = rfr.report_file_id) left join imp_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join imp_spec isp on (ir.imp_spec_id = isp.imp_spec_id), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where p.submission_date between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and p.process_type_id in (2 /*Import*/) and ( p.status_id in (3 /*Executed with Errors*/, 14 /*Interrupted*/, 20 /*Canceled: Num Cells Limit Exceeded*/) or (p.status_id in (0 /*Pending*/, 4 /*In Queue*/) and p.start_date < current_date) )

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual ) select rf.report_name || isp.name || i.integration_name || r.rule "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/admin/integrationrun/Form.do?id=' || p.process_id "Link", p.process_id "Process ID", ps.status "Status", p.un "Owner", to_char(p.submission_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(p.start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", p.error_message "Error Message" from process p join dates on (1 = 1) join process_status ps on (p.status_id = ps.process_status_id) left join integration_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join integration i on (i.integration_id = ir.integration_id) left join rule_run rr on (rr.process_id = p.process_id) left join rule r on (r.rule_id = rr.rule_id) left join report_run rfr on (rfr.process_id = p.process_id) left join report_files rf on (rf.report_file_id = rfr.report_file_id) left join imp_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join imp_spec isp on (ir.imp_spec_id = isp.imp_spec_id), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where p.submission_date between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and p.process_type_id in (5 /*Integration*/) and ( p.status_id in (3 /*Executed with Errors*/, 14 /*Interrupted*/, 20 /*Canceled: Num Cells Limit Exceeded*/) or (p.status_id in (0 /*Pending*/, 4 /*In Queue*/) and p.start_date < current_date) )

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual ) select rf.report_name || isp.name || i.integration_name || r.rule "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/admin/configimport/Form.do?id=' || isp.imp_spec_id "Link", p.process_id "Process ID", ps.status "Status", p.un "Owner", to_char(p.submission_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(p.start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", p.error_message "Error Message" from process p join dates on (1 = 1) join process_status ps on (p.status_id = ps.process_status_id) left join integration_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join integration i on (i.integration_id = ir.integration_id) left join rule_run rr on (rr.process_id = p.process_id) left join rule r on (r.rule_id = rr.rule_id) left join report_run rfr on (rfr.process_id = p.process_id) left join report_files rf on (rf.report_file_id = rfr.report_file_id) left join imp_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join imp_spec isp on (ir.imp_spec_id = isp.imp_spec_id), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where p.submission_date between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and p.process_type_id in (2 /*Import*/) and ( p.status_id in (3 /*Executed with Errors*/, 14 /*Interrupted*/, 20 /*Canceled: Num Cells Limit Exceeded*/) or (p.status_id in (0 /*Pending*/, 4 /*In Queue*/) and p.start_date < current_date) )

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual ) select rf.report_name || isp.name || i.integration_name || r.rule "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/admin/integrationrun/Form.do?id=' || p.process_id "Link", p.process_id "Process ID", ps.status "Status", p.un "Owner", to_char(p.submission_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(p.start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", p.error_message "Error Message" from process p join dates on (1 = 1) join process_status ps on (p.status_id = ps.process_status_id) left join integration_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join integration i on (i.integration_id = ir.integration_id) left join rule_run rr on (rr.process_id = p.process_id) left join rule r on (r.rule_id = rr.rule_id) left join report_run rfr on (rfr.process_id = p.process_id) left join report_files rf on (rf.report_file_id = rfr.report_file_id) left join imp_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join imp_spec isp on (ir.imp_spec_id = isp.imp_spec_id), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where p.submission_date between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and p.process_type_id in (5 /*Integration*/) and ( p.status_id in (3 /*Executed with Errors*/, 14 /*Interrupted*/, 20 /*Canceled: Num Cells Limit Exceeded*/) or (p.status_id in (0 /*Pending*/, 4 /*In Queue*/) and p.start_date < current_date) )

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual )
select t_nq.notif_queue_id "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/grid/SimpleGrid.do?ModuleName=ADMIN_NOTIF_QUEUE' "Link", t_nq.to_address "Recipient (Email)", t_nq.subj "Subject", case when t_nq.queue_status_id = 4 then 'Failed. No more attempts' end "Status", to_char(t_nq.created_ts, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(t_nq.processed_ts, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", t_nqa.err_code "Error Message" from notif_queue t_nq join notif_queue_attempt t_nqa on ( t_nqa.notif_queue_id = t_nq.notif_queue_id ) join (select t_nq.notif_queue_id "Process Object Name", max(t_nqa.notif_queue_attempt_id) "LAST_ATTEMPT_ID" from notif_queue t_nq join dates on (1 = 1) join notif_queue_attempt t_nqa on ( t_nqa.notif_queue_id = t_nq.notif_queue_id ) where t_nq.created_ts between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and t_nq.queue_status_id = 4 /*Failed. No more attempts*/ group by t_nq.notif_queue_id) t_filter_notif on (t_filter_notif.last_attempt_id = t_nqa.notif_queue_attempt_id), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual ) select rf.report_name || isp.name || i.integration_name || r.rule "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/admin/reports/Form.do?id=' || rf.report_file_id "Link", p.process_id "Process ID", ps.status "Status", p.un "Owner", to_char(p.submission_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(p.start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", p.error_message "Error Message" from process p join dates on (1 = 1) join process_status ps on (p.status_id = ps.process_status_id) left join integration_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join integration i on (i.integration_id = ir.integration_id) left join rule_run rr on (rr.process_id = p.process_id) left join rule r on (r.rule_id = rr.rule_id) left join report_run rfr on (rfr.process_id = p.process_id) left join report_files rf on (rf.report_file_id = rfr.report_file_id) left join imp_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join imp_spec isp on (ir.imp_spec_id = isp.imp_spec_id), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where p.submission_date between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and p.process_type_id in (1 /*Report*/) and p.status_id in (3 /*Executed with Errors*/, 14 /*Interrupted*/, 20 /*Canceled: Num Cells Limit Exceeded*/)

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual ) select rf.report_name || isp.name || i.integration_name || r.rule "Process Object Name", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/admin/rules/Form.do?id=' || r.rule_id "Link", p.process_id "Process ID", ps.status "Status", p.un "Owner", to_char(p.submission_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Submitted", to_char(p.start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') "Scheduled", p.error_message "Error Message", u1.un "Created By", u2.un "Modified By" from process p join dates on (1 = 1) join process_status ps on (p.status_id = ps.process_status_id) left join integration_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join integration i on (i.integration_id = ir.integration_id) left join rule_run rr on (rr.process_id = p.process_id) left join rule r on (r.rule_id = rr.rule_id) left join report_run rfr on (rfr.process_id = p.process_id) left join report_files rf on (rf.report_file_id = rfr.report_file_id) left join imp_run ir on (ir.process_id = p.process_id) left join imp_spec isp on (ir.imp_spec_id = isp.imp_spec_id) left join comp_object_log col on ( col.component_id = 4 /*Rule*/ and col.object_id = r.rule_id ) left join users u1 on (u1.user_id = col.created_by) left join users u2 on (u2.user_id = col.modified_by), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where p.submission_date between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and p.process_type_id in (6 /*Rule*/) and ( p.status_id in (3 /*Executed with Errors*/, 14 /*Interrupted*/, 20 /*Canceled: Num Cells Limit Exceeded*/) or (p.status_id in (0 /*Pending*/, 4 /*In Queue*/) and p.start_date < current_date) )

with dates as ( select case when :start_date_null is null then current_date - 7 else to_date(:start_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end start_date, case when :end_date_null is null then current_date else to_date(:end_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') end end_date from dual )
select t_log.tm_log_id "TM Log ID", 'https://' || t_domain.value || '/grid/SimpleGrid.do?ModuleName=TRACKOR_MAIL_LOG' "Link", t_status.name "Status", t_log.ts "Timestamp", t_xitor_type.xitor_type "Trackor Type", t_log.from_address "From Address", t_log.to_address "To Address", t_log.subject "Subject", t_log.error_message "Error Message" from tm_log t_log join dates on (1 = 1) join tm_log_status t_status on ( t_status.tm_log_status_id = t_log.status_id ) join tm_setup t_setup on ( t_setup.tm_setup_id = t_log.tm_setup_id ) join xitor_type t_xitor_type on ( t_xitor_type.xitor_type_id = t_setup.xitor_type_id ), (select value from param_system where name='DomainName') t_domain where t_log.ts between dates.start_date and dates.end_date and t_log.status_id in (1 /*Processing error*/, 3 /*Processing error (TF)*/, 4 /*Job error*/)
